articles.title: Switch emulator makers agree to pay $2.4 million to settle Nintendo lawsuit - Ars Technica
articles.description: Yuzu devs shut down emulator they now say is "primarily designed" to break DRM.

articles.content: An ambitious NASA project designed to test satellite refueling in space, known as OSAM-1, has been discontinued after significant technical, cost, and scheduling difficulties. The cancellation comes … [+3994 chars]
